alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Orange; Washington; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:05PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Orange, east central Addison, northeastern Rutland, northwestern Windsor and south central Washington Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 505 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Braintree, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Braintree Hill, Tunbridge, Hancock, Bethel, Randolph, Rochester, Roxbury, Braintree, Granville, Brookfield, Ripton, Stockbridge, Northfield, Pittsfield, Williamstown, Royalton, East Brookfield, East Randolph, Randolph Center, and East Bethel. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 24 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Orange; Washington; Western Windsor
